name: Odeline
description:
Odeline is a sci-fi narrative platformer game released in demo during a school project. 

The game is made in 10 days with Gamemaker. It's actually my first game I made to learn the difficulties of making an entire game with a start and an ending in  a short period of time...  

Story : 

Odeline is charged to deliver Earth's data to the spatial data center but her spaceship is absorbed in a wormhole ! She appears lost in the middle of a forest and try to find a way to get out from this world where everything seems similar to Earth but .. something is wrong !
